title: Smart Data Models - LoadStatic
description: Adapted from CIM data models. General static load model representing the sensitivity of the real and reactive power consumed by the load to the amplitude and frequency of the bus voltage.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be LoadStatic

LoadAggregate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Aggregate load to which this aggregate static load belongs. Default: None

ep1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. First term voltage exponent for active power (Ep1).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

ep2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second term voltage exponent for active power (Ep2).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

ep3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Third term voltage exponent for active power (Ep3).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

eq1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. First term voltage exponent for reactive power (Eq1).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

eq2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second term voltage exponent for reactive power (Eq2).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

eq3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Third term voltage exponent for reactive power (Eq3).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

kp1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. First term voltage coefficient for active power (Kp1).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

kp2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second term voltage coefficient for active power (Kp2).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

kp3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Third term voltage coefficient for active power (Kp3).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

kp4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency coefficient for active power (Kp4).  Must be non-zero when .staticLoadModelType = ZIP2.  Not used for all other values of .staticLoadModelType. Default: 0.0

kpf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency deviation coefficient for active power (Kpf).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

kq1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. First term voltage coefficient for reactive power (Kq1).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

kq2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second term voltage coefficient for reactive power (Kq2).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

kq3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Third term voltage coefficient for reactive power (Kq3).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

kq4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency coefficient for reactive power (Kq4).  Must be non-zero when .staticLoadModelType = ZIP2.  Not used for all other values of .staticLoadModelType. Default: 0.0

kqf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency deviation coefficient for reactive power (Kqf).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

staticLoadModelType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of static load model.  Typical Value = constantZ. Default: None
